segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to buy a color TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We carry products from three large manufacturers and some imported ones , too . Do you have a specific model in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Which one do you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This one from Sony gives a very sharp picture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , but I'd prefer to buy a China-made set .
segments.speaker: S2
